data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample ABP-101

Exposition SW, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Anstehender Kalk und Kalksch. , av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 5%, Vegatation type: Flachgr. trock. Fö-Standort. Stark windexp. , Film number: 591A
